title: Boardwalk Empire
creator: Terrence Winter
consensus_highlights: Boardwalk Empire is a lavish period crime drama set in Atlantic City during Prohibition. Steve Buscemi delivers a masterful performance as Enoch 'Nucky' Thompson, a political boss and crime lord navigating the turbulent 1920s. The series features impeccable production design and a remarkable ensemble cast.
notes: Terence Martin's screenplay for The Aviator provides the blueprint for Boardwalk Empire's lavish period recreation.
